scripts.browser: cd ./imt-poseidon-rs && wasm-pack build --target web && cp -r ./pkg ../imt-browser-benchmarks/src/assets/wasm/ && cd ../imt-browser-benchmarks && yarn install && npm run dev
scripts.node: cd ./imt-poseidon-rs && wasm-pack build --target nodejs && cd ../imt-node-benchmarks && yarn ts-node src/main.ts
